_header: Put out his head list not for to dare
_description: John Lydgate, Verses urging that thieving Millers and Bakers be put in the Pillory — three 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc)

BLHar2255.First Lines:
Put out his hed lyst nat for to darebut lyk a man vpon that tour to
                    abyde…
BLHar2255.Last Lines:
…They may cleyme be Iust auctoriteVpon that bastile to make an
                    ende
